User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://cravelle.github.io/sitemap.xml

# Disallow sensitive areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /.git/
Disallow: /node_modules/
Disallow: /src/
Disallow: *.log

# Allow search engines to index images
User-agent: Googlebot-Image
Allow: /images/

# Crawl delay (optional)
# Crawl-delay: 1
